data.name: ksCannotLoadFile
data.value: File {0} could not be loaded. {1}

data.name: ksCannotRedefineFactoryStyle
data.value: Cannot redefine factory style {0} to have a different Type, Context, Structure, or Function in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksCannotReplaceXwithY
data.value: Style {0} cannot be replaced with {1} because their contexts are incompatible. Error in <replacements> tag in {2}.
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksInfoBarBtnToolTipFmt
data.comment: title of the button's corresponding sidebar tab followed by the tab's current button

data.name: ksInvalidFirstLineHanging
data.value: Illegal specification of both 'firstLine' and 'hanging' attributes for {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksInvalidResourceFileVersion
data.value: Invalid version attribute in {0}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to initialize factory settings, such as styles.

data.name: ksMissingBasedOnStyle
data.value: The basedOn style for {0} style must be specified in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksMissingParagraphNode
data.value: Paragraph style {0} must have a paragraph node in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksNegativeLineSpacing
data.value: Negative value is not valid for paragraph 'lineSpacing' attribute of {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksNoBasedOnSelf
data.value: Style {0} cannot be based on itself (as defined in {1}).
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownAlignmentValue
data.value: Unrecognized value for paragraph 'alignment' attribute of {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownAttrUnits
data.value: Unrecognized units specified for '{0}' attribute of {1} style in {2}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownBackgroundValue
data.value: Unrecognized value for paragraph 'background' attribute of {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownBasedOnStyle
data.value: Unrecognized basedOn style for {0} style in {2}: {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownBorderValue
data.value: Unrecognized value for paragraph 'border' attribute of {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownFontType
data.value: Unrecognized value for font 'type' attribute of {0} style in {1}
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: ksUnknownLineSpacingValue
data.value: Unrecognized value for paragraph 'lineSpacingType' attribute of {0} style in {1}

data.name: ksUnknownNextStyle
data.value: Unrecognized next style for {0} style in {2}: {1}

data.name: ksUnknownStyleAttribute
data.value: Unrecognized '{0}' attribute for style {1} in {2}

data.name: ksUnknownUnderlineColor
data.value: Unrecognized value for 'underlineColor' attribute of {0} style in {1}

data.name: CouldNotReEstablishConnectionToDatabase
data.value: Could not re-establish a connection to the database.

data.name: ksInvalidStyleContext
data.value: Style {0} is illegally defined with context '{1}' in {2}.
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory styles.

data.name: kstidIncompatibleDTDVersion
data.value: {0} conforms to a DTD which is incompatible with this version of the program. This version of the program requires version {1}.
data.comment: Error message when processing an XML file to create factory settings (styles, publications, etc.).

data.value: Project Properties
data.comment: Text for Undo/Redo when changing project properties

data.value: The new name differs only in letter case -- this is insufficient to change the database name.

data.value: You cannot rename projects on another computer on the network.
